title: Motley Fool Money: 03.25.2011
description: Is Amazon's new venture with Google a serious threat to Apple?  Are the television networks becoming Netflix's worst nightmare? And could Warren Buffett's next acquisition involve a talking duck?  We tackle those questions, share some stocks on our radar, and talk tech with Washington Post columnist Rob Pegoraro.
content:encoded: Is Amazon's new venture with Google a serious threat to Apple?  Are the television networks becoming Netflix's worst nightmare? And could Warren Buffett's next acquisition involve a talking duck?  We tackle those questions, share some stocks on our radar, and talk tech with Washington Post columnist Rob Pegoraro.
